definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute at @e[type=lantern_of_the_woodlands:protector] run particle lantern_of_the_woodlands:protector_particle_red ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.001 1 force</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute at @e[type=lantern_of_the_woodlands:projectile_fireball] run particle lantern_of_the_woodlands:particle_fireball_red ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0 1 force</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute at @e[type=armor_stand,name=basicspell2light] run particle lantern_of_the_woodlands:small_fireball_particle ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.001 1 force</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">BasicSpellRepeat</field></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="text" x="846" y="126"><field name="TEXT">1</field></block><block type="text" x="854" y="186"><field name="TEXT">2</field></block></xml>
